message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"car; motor vehicle","sentence":"他们有汽车。","image_prompt":"A small group of people stands together, smiling in soft apocalypse animation style, next to a car parked on a simple road. The scene is peaceful, with gentle, muted post-apocalyptic colors, distant abandoned buildings, and overgrown plants, giving a hopeful mood. The car is bright and clean, a symbol of comfort amidst the changing world.","sentence_translation":"They have a car."}
